data.title: Litigation Paralegal
data.content: Collaborate with industry-leading clients and stakeholders in the residential real estate sector;Counsel over ten clients daily on their legal matters regarding responsibilities to tenants under the Residential Tenancies Act;Analyze case law, video evidence, witness statements, and other forms of disclosure to prepare for hearings on multiple files;Advocate on behalf of clients on a handful of hearings to negotiate favourable settlements with tenants and opposing counsel during mediation and hearings
